page.title: 08MARYC.HOME LIFE WEEKDAY M.H.
page.content: A typical Friday for me is to wake up at 7.30 am.After hearing my mum call,I jump out of bed and get dressed.I read until 8.15 am then set off for the bus. At 9.00am we go into school. Usually we do:R.E.,Maths.,English etc.Sometimes we have the computer in our room.After mid-morning break we do project work.At 12.15pm we have lunch.I stay at school for mine.We have an hour for it.Then we have hobbies,or can draw,paint,or make up a play.We finish school at 3.15pm.I use my home computer or play with my friend Alexander till tea at 6.00pm.Then,I either watch TV or go out.9.00pm is bedtime.I read for half an hour,then turn out the light and fall asleep.
